No need to ask twice. Rockseeker blasts off and lands just in front 
of Hydras. He pulled out his dual gun and fired.

Rockseeker: Is there something you wanted to say, creep?

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "airly2000" <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> Hydras::
> 
> "Come here...."hissed Hydras"I'll teach you good manners"
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "Nic" <Proudwing500k@h...> wrote:
> > OOC: There are some non-regular weapons, but he's a NPC.
> > 
> > BIC
> > 
> > As he sees the Predacons answer his challenge, Rockseeker slowly 
> > starts to laugh. His is a maniacal laugh that he's not used to 
> make.
> > 
> > Rockseeker: So, the parasites have come out to play, heh? (He's 
> > clearly Canadian!) Let's oblige them.
> > 
> > Shots are fired and he ceases firing his dual pulse gun in order 
> to 
> > create a force wall that absorbed the hits.
> > 
> > Rockseeker: Who dares to defy me?

> > >

robot

his

out

forcefield,
